unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Get a Boost – Diwali Dhamaka for Homeowners!**
normalised: Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Get a Boost – Diwali Dhamaka for Homeowners!

unnormalised: Good news, folks! Get ready to shine bright this Diwali, literally! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) just announced an enhanced subsidy scheme for rooftop solar installations. Forget those electricity bills giving you stress!
normalised: Good news, folks! Get ready to shine bright this Diwali, literally! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (M N R E) just announced an enhanced subsidy scheme for rooftop solar installations. Forget those electricity bills giving you stress!

unnormalised: Under the updated scheme, homeowners in cities like Mumbai, Delhi, and even smaller towns like Kanpur can now avail subsidies of up to 40% for systems up to 3 kW. That's a substantial saving!
normalised: Under the updated scheme, homeowners in cities like Mumbai, Delhi, and even smaller towns like Kanpur can now avail subsidies of up to forty percent for systems up to three kilowatt. That's a substantial saving!

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from IIT-Delhi, a leading solar energy expert, believes this will incentivize more folks to go solar. "Imagine installing solar panels on your 1000 sq ft roof in your house in Chennai and saving big bucks! It's a win-win."
normalised: Doctor Sharma from I I T slash Delhi, a leading solar energy expert, believes this will incentivize more folks to go solar. "Imagine installing solar panels on your one thousand square feet roof in your house in Chennai and saving big bucks! It's a win-win."

unnormalised: The scheme also simplifies the application process through a dedicated online portal. Expect faster approvals and quicker disbursement of subsidies, directly into your account.
normalised: The scheme also simplifies the application process through a dedicated online portal. Expect faster approvals and quicker disbursement of subsidies, directly into your account.

unnormalised: Think about it, reducing your carbon footprint while also saving Rs. 20,000-30,000 annually? Diwali sweets for everyone, courtesy of the sun! So, get those applications in! Time to go green and save some green!
normalised: Think about it, reducing your carbon footprint while also saving rupees twenty thousand to thirty thousand annually? Diwali sweets for everyone, courtesy of the sun! So, get those applications in! Time to go green and save some green!
